1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

Clearly and concisely describe what you expected to happen.

## ❌ Actual Behavior

Clearly and concisely describe what actually happened.

- Operating System: [e.g. iOS, Windows 10, macOS]

- Width: [e.g. 1920px]
